response.overview: After four months unable to do the thing he loves the most, stand up comedian Vittorio Angelone has decided to create a comedy club in his back garden. Despite facing severe anxiety every time he performs, Vittorio has missed performing to a crowd more than anything else - will he be able to convince people to come and watch him perform on a hand-built stage?
response.tagline: After four months unable to do the thing he loves the most, stand up comedian Vittorio Angelone has decided to create a comedy club in his back garden
response.title: The Socially Distant Social Club
